Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Abandu bomung’otio (bomushitsimi- bomumasookholio)	baboola mbu khwasuubila, bola mbu mushili okhusuubila, halali boole mbu khwinjile mubwisilamu, obusubili, bushili okwinjila mimioyo chienyu, neni muloonde ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe shalabalemilia shiosishiosi mubikhole bienyu tawe, toto Nyasaye nomulesheli wobukoosia muno
Toto Abasuubili nibalia basuubila Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, mana nibalaba netsinganakani tawe, mana nibakhalabana khunjila ya Nyasaye nemiandu nende emioyo chiabu, obo nibo abatoto
Boola mbu : “ koo mwechesinjia Nyasaye idini yenyu, Ne Nyasaye yamanya bioosi bili mwikulu nende mushialo, ne Nyasaye nomumanyi wabuli eshindu.”
Bakhuminanga mbu benjila mubusalamu, boola mbu: “mulaamina khulwokhwinjila khwenyu mubusalamu tawe, halali Nyasaye niwabenyela amalayi, nabalunjisia khubusuubili nimuli mbu muli abatoto.”
Toto Nyasaye yamanya akefisa mwikulu nende mushialo, na Nyasaye alolanga muno kamukholanga
Qaaf, Nditsuba khukurani yoluyali
Bawukanga mbu Omwikanyilisi yabeetsela okhurula mubo! Abakhayi nibaboola mbu: “ po kano nikokhuchenjia.”
Mbu nikhulifwa mana khube liloba, okhukalukha okho khuli ehale (shikhunyalikhana tawe)
Toto khwamanya shosi shiosi shilemukha khusialo mubio, ne khuli nende eshitabo eshibikhanga koosi
Halali bakhaya obwatoto olwabwabeetsela, mana abo bali mubukoyanu
Shibalolangakhwo likulu hekulu wabu, shingala khwaliumbakha mana nikhulirona, shililikhwo nolwafwa tawe
Ne liloba khwalikwaalasia mana nikhuliramwo	tsingulu,	mana nikhumesiakhwo buli imbia yemimela
Kho shibe eshilolelo nende eshitsulisio khu buli omusumba ulunjikha khuNyasaye
Ne khweshia amaatsi ketsimbabaasi okhurula mwikulu nikhumesilia emikunda nende imele ichesungwa
Nende emitende emirambi chilikhwo ebibuli (chiebulana mubunji)
Omukabo khubandu banje, mana nikhulamusia eshialo shiali nishifwile, ne ni endio nilwa Abandu balilamusibwa
Bakhaya imbeli wabu Abandu ba Nuh nende Abandu ba Rasi nende ba Thamud
Nende ba Aa’d nende ba Firaun nende Abana babu Lut
Nende abamenyi ba Aikat (bomumasokholio) , nende Abandu ba Tubaa, boosi bakhaya Abarumwa mana kabekanyilisibwa nikabanyoola
Ne muparanga	khwachong’a olwakhwabaloonga olwokhuranjilila ? halali bo bali nobukanakani khukhuloongwa okhuyiakha
Netoto khwaloonga Omundu ne khwamanya shimubeyibeyinjia mumwoyo kukwe, nafu khuli ahambi khuye okhushila omusi kwo mwikosi we
Olwa Abamalaika babili balibukanana, owundi niyekhala omukhono omulunji ne owundi omukaata
Shiyakhaboola liosi liosi tawe halali Raqib nende Atid – balihambi naye (bakaandilka)
Ne tsisaalila tsiokhurula omwoyo tsiliitsa khubwatoto. Ako niko kawatechelelanga
Ne ulwika lulikhupwa, eyo niyo inyaanga yeyindukho
Ne buli Omundu aliitsa nali nende Omuliindi nende Omuloli
Aboolelwe mbu: “Toto ewe wali wang’ang’alila kano, mana khukhurere habulafu, kho okhulola khukhwo nyanga yino nokhulayi muno
Ne owashie aliboola mbu: “ wendi ninaye uno amalile okhurechekhwa.”
Musukune mumulilo buli omukhayi omwandakanyu
Owikalilanga amalayi, wabura eshichelo, owuyendinjia (omukanakania)
Ulia watsokaasia Nyasaye nende abanyaye baandi, mana musukune mushinyasio eshilulu
